mapper.select: select productCode, productName, productDesc, productPrice, productImagePath, lowcategoryEng from product
mapper.insert: insert into product (productCode, productName, productDesc, productPrice, productImagePath, lowcategoryEng) values (#{productCode}, #{productName}, #{productDesc}, #{productPrice}, #{productImagePath}, #{lowcategoryEng})
mapper.update: update product set productName=#{productName}, productDesc=#{productDesc}, productPrice=#{productPrice}, productImage=#{productImagePath}, productLowcategoryEng=#{productLowcategoryEng} where productCode=#{productCode}
